author: crisangel
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Finals
body:
[![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPkWWeBXuEPvSpr9BuqTBabGaB6WJaDgJ5UwLPortvcYT/image.png)](https://pixabay.com/es/rusia-ruso-copa-del-mundo-2018-3037142/)
Greetings my dear readers, The Futbol world cup is almost over, this week ends in a big way, since with it also ended the great world soccer championship, capable of bringing together millions and millions of people to celebrate such a prestigious event. The 2018 world cup Russia, is made, with its main protagonists for the final, they are France and Croatia, both teams will meet to define who will be worthy of lifting the World Cup.

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmSf4E5g9cEKcwPcHzuoqXXwiuSgPjVjXF84QfTqnrhPno/image.png)
[Source.](https://www.123rf.com/photo_56930236_france-vs-croatia-flags-on-a-green-soccer-field.html?fromid=VWVQUFFpQ0FJWUN5QmZBeUNNZ2NiUT09)
![quijote.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRQmbyFivHFEG5s43Z9vGzccbHnWcNEASR6Re6E9Ua4Et/quijote.gif)
![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmc8J82mK9spey5WB6BSJcgBB8Sk7Q2HH4tUBJ95VBjFNc/image.png)
[Source.](https://talksport.com/football/373172/world-cup-2018-fixtures-results-games/)
Although we are in the final week where will the World Cup ended, we continue celebrating with emotion to the fullest and shouting a goal with a strong voice. A prediction contest will be organized for the next instance, I'm talking about the semifinals, where @blocktrades will be the sponsor and @acidyo and @anomadsoul know that many Steemians love this game, so they decided to organize this great event.
![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVY3yz8j53LSTuNmC7mQhNcZcPmHCdjztAMcAneUve7bQ/image.png)
[Source.](https://prnt.sc/iu376a)
It is very easy to continue participating in this contest, your name must be on this list and you have to make a post picking each winner for the last 2 games, the final and the third place matches. You have to include the score you think will happen on these 2 games in Regular time (only the first 90 minutes).
Here I share my selections for the final and the third place matches.

Score
|
Team
|
vs
|
Team
|
Score
-|-|-|-|-
2
|
France
|
vs
|
Croatia
|
1

|
vs
|
England
|
1
As a contest without rules is not a contest, the rules remain the same, here I share them so that you know them and start participating.
![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWWFh39BQYcb38iLS2c68hyLRHPMXcBhq6eFBnCZ7hcbf/image.png)
[Source.](https://prnt.sc/iu376a)

Rules:

1 - The title of your post must be: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Finals

2 - In your publication, you must include a link to this announcement made by @worldcup-russia, you can see it here.

3 - Use the format included in the link above so we can organize each entry.

4 - Use the tags #blocktradesworldcup and the tag #mypicks.

5 - Resteem the publication of the announcement of this challenge, enter here to see it.

6 - You can't edit your post after the first match of this stage start.

7 - Minimum Reputation to participate is 40. This is to avoid bots from joining.

8 - 8 - You can submit your entry until July 14th 2018 at 16:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone. If you don¬¥t know that time zone,check it here.

9 - Only people whose name is on this list can participate.

Scoring

You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn¬¥t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point.
Important Note: I am not on the list of accessible participants to win the cup, because I do not have enough points to enter the top 10, so that means I have no chance of winning the world cup of @blocktrades. Even though I am already eliminated I wanted to make my publication for the final, knowing that it will not be taken into account, but I only do it to fulfill and finish my process in the competition.
This is a @blocktrades sponsored contest, if you like what he is doing, vote for @blocktrades as witness here.

This is an organized contest @acidyo & @anomadsoul, if you like what they are doing, vote for @ocd-witness as witness here.

Thanks to @blocktrades, @anomadsoul and @acidyo for organizing this great competition very fun and competitive. Many successes to all those who are still fighting for good scores and get a very good amount of 2,000SBD well. Greetings to all and a strong psychological hug.

https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/404872034452242433/453339855326412804/bitmoji-20180603104611.png?width=300&height=300

Do not miss the opportunity to join this wonderful party, such as the World Cup, and participate in this prestigious event. Remember that the Soccer World Cup is only celebrated once every 4 years, will you be left out? Score many goals with your predictions and be one of the possible winners.
![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmexRT1G21eUrLePoWT5zqZuQHq8vz53Up5y6DYqDRKzNb/image.png)
[Source.](https://prnt.sc/iu376a)
I also want to add that although no South American team (Confederation Conmebol) could enter the semifinals, I still feel very happy with the participations from Brazil, Uruguay, Argentina, Colombia and Peru, all of them did their best, leaving well up one of the most difficult confederations to classify to the worldcup. I clear that my heart is 100% vinotinto by Venezuelan that I am. Force Conmebol.

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWqWSkcjps8qBUYtPsRUEXwQURMhkoaUsYBjx7unEVk64/image.png)
[Source.](https://larepublica.pe/deportes/1066190-eliminatorias-rusia-2018-en-conmebol-fixture-de-las-clasificatorias-sudamericanas)
Posted from my blog with SteemPress : https://crisangel.000webhostapp.com/2018/07/the-blocktrades-world-cup-my-selections-for-the-finals
[![TheAlliance.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXRrYfqL4DArLgGoU8PWWdutJ8Mtvqf9MXnCyJQd6Q9Dx/TheAlliance.png)](https://steemit.com/thealliance/@syndicates/the-new-framework-of-thealliance)

author: travelling-two
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Finals
body:
https://s5.postimg.cc/e3swi6l2v/football-3344911_960_720.png

**[Source](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/final-stage-submit-your-entry-and-win-2-000-sbd)**

Hello Steemian Friends,

It's coming towards the end of a great month of football! The World Cup in Russia is drawing to an end and so is **[@blocktrades sponsored contest on Steemit](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/final-stage-submit-your-entry-and-win-2-000-sbd)**. It looks like "Football Isn't Coming Home". Sadly, and still feeling the effects today, England won't be in the Final. They will have to settle it with Belgium for third place. This isn't their first meeting in this World Cup as they were placed in the same group (Group G) and in the group game Belgium nicked it 1-0. However, Gareth Southgate did change much of the squad for that game as they knew they were through to the knockout stages and secretly, we believe they wanted to be second in order to go on the "easier" side of the knockout draw. The more experienced Croatia team upset the odds and have the chance to win the World Cup for the very first time in their history! Though, it is a matter of getting passed a star stud France team. We'll be routing for the French and English in both games (due to our interest) and therefore our predicted results favour them:

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 2 | France | vs | Croatia | 0 1 | Belgium | vs | England | 2

Finally, we want to thank **@worldcup-russia**, **@blocktrades**, **@anomadsoul** & **@acidyo** for hosting, sponsoring and organising what has been a thrilling contest! Loads of results did not go our way, but that is the beauty of the beautiful game. Upsets are meant to happen. Yet, we hope to bow out of this contest with two correct scorelines, but we'll settle for two correct results. Until Qatar 2022, all the best!

As always,

Stay Classy Steemians!

*Thank you for taking the time to read our post. If you really like our content, please follow us as we post regularly with different topics from Monday to Friday (with some exceptions at the weekends). How about your followers? Would they like this post? If so, please resteem it! Finally, if you are generous, please give us an Upvote! We thank you in advance! Lots of love / **@travelling-two***

author: warpedpoetic
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Finals
body:
At the rating of the quarter finals, I have dropped from fourth to seventh position in the top 10 leading contestants for the blocktrades world cup predictions. I think I goofed in my quarter finals predictions. 

***
<center>![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png)</center>
***
I was lucky though, I got the semi final prediction for Croatia vs England right. I don't know if the scores I fixed would apply though as the second Croatian goal came at extra time. Any how, it has been interesting so far. 
***
As a result of this contest, I have had reasons to watch football matches. üòÇ, I was screaming with my friend yesterday when Croatia scored the second goal. The day before, I even sat down and enjoyed a can of Heineken lager as we watched the Belgium versus France match. My dad would be shocked.

I felt bad for Belgium. I really wanted them to win the match against France but France was determined to get to that finals. It's all good though because I believe that Croatia is going to do me proud. 

Well let me quit rambling and share my predictions for the final stage of this surprisingcontest. I have placed predictions randomly, out of sentiments, and desire all through the different stages and some how I am still here. It's just funny. 
***
<center>**MY PREDICTIONS FOR THE FINAL STAGE**</center>
***
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | France | vs | Croatia | 2
2 | Belgium | vs | England | 0

***
#### Yes Croatia will take this cup. See you on the other side though.
***
In case you are reading about this for the first time, you can check the announcement here; [FINAL STAGE - Submit your entry and win 2,000 SBD](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/final-stage-submit-your-entry-and-win-2-000-sbd).

Thanks to @blocktrades for sponsoring this contest as well as @acidyo and @anomadsoul for giving everyone the opportunity to enjoy the world cup.

author: joel0101
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Finals
body:
![image.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmeLEuvgXwPJSVtxbMZDkKCRpbHakwnR3kzpzzY6C1myQp)

Dear Steemians,

Here we are now. We know who will battle for the title and the 3rd place.

In both cases, even though it does not appear like that at a first sight, we have a rematch situation. 

The final between France and Croatia (Hrvatska) is a rematch of a semi-final game from 1998 which was won 2-1 by France who ended beating Brasil in a lopsided game to clinch the World Cup title.

The match for 3rd place is more obvious since it is the rematch of the last game of the group of England and Belgium wichi was won 1-0 by Belgium. 

Even though I lived in France for most of my life prior moving to Germany. My heart would wish that Croatia wins the title, their team proved to have the willpower to win the games and went through extra-times and penalties to qualify for the finals.

France did not have real difficulties even if the last minute of the 8th finals game against Argentina were a bit thrilling. In the end France always found a way to win in the regulation and will probably be fresher than its opponent. Their advantage is that they have a group which applies the strategy of Didier Deschamps who won the title in ..... You got it 1998. He was in the group. A very excellent defensive player.

Experience against Willpower is a good mix and I am going to think that this year is Croatia¬¥s year.

For 3rd place I would see a win for Belgium in the hope that Fellaini does not make any mistake. 

Here we are with my picks

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | France | vs | Croatia | 1
2 | Belgium | vs | England | 1

For further information to participate to the contest I kindly invite you to use following link:

https://staging.busy.org/@worldcup-russia/final-stage-submit-your-entry-and-win-2-000-sbd

I wish you good luck in the contest.

Best regards
Yours
@joel0101

author: reyvaj
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Finals
body:
For many France will be the champion, has been very strong against the rivals who have touched on the way to the final and has unbalancing players, such as Mbapp√©, Griezmann and Pogba. But Croatia has been showing good football since the start of the championship and also has in it team great players, such as Luka Modric, Mandzukic and Vida. France certainly has the advantage of getting more rested to Sunday's showdown, not only because they played their semifinal game a day earlier, but also because Croatia have had to play the extra time of the three matches by direct elimination that they played, in so much that France has won all three of its matches in regular time. However, in the context of a final, the mental part is probably more influential than physics. And Croatia in that sense has shown great strength, winning two definitions by penalty kicks and overcoming against England to an adverse result (was losing and reversed).
My predictions for the finals are: Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 1 | France | vs | Croatia | 1 3 | Belgium | vs | England | 1 To participate see the rules [here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/final-stage-submit-your-entry-and-win-2-000-sbd)

author: adiza
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Finals
body:
![image](https://img.esteem.ws/dv0xhelc6s.jpg)
# World Cup has reached the final, this is the top round after the team passed group stage, last 16 stage and the quarter finals. this is the best achievement of two great countries in the world, namely Croatia and France. the two countries are working hard to reach the final. Many stories in the World Cup Russia-2018, because the country championed as a candidate who will reach the final have all been eliminated. The #blocktradesworldcup competition has also reached the top, after the final game is over they will declare who the winners are eligible to get a gift of SBD from @blocktrades. They promised 2000 SBD to the winners who participated in this extraordinary competition. For more details you can visit original post .. !!
Worldcup-Russia, Get 2,000 SBD
By getting 36 points in the previous three stages, I had the opportunity to follow the competition in the final, I also have some points because in semi finals I won a prediction between Croatia Vs England.
![image](https://img.esteem.ws/q5odd0f3pb.jpg)
Hope I win this competition, because it's a great competition with a high value prize. Prediction in the final round is a very difficult decision we do. But the competition name someone must do something to qualify as a contestant. ***Below is my prediction for the finals*** Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 1| France | vs | Croatia | 0 1 | Belgium | vs | England | 2 hopefully I am a lucrative person in this world-class competition. With this very prestigious competition, I say many thanks to @blocktrades the sponsor of this contest and Thanks To @acidyo & @anomadsoul organized This Contedt.
Success for You & Success for Us the Steemians !! # Don't Forget Upvote & ***

**Hello Steemians and Football Lover**

Finally... World Cup 2018 has reached the final round and there are two best teams in the final. France and Croatia face each other in the final after conquering their respective opponents. Me and you can not wait for who will come out as the winner.  Certainly exciting and full of drama for football lovers. Prepare your best guess and won the prize.

body: The big @blocktrades world cup is coming to and end as the final stage of the world cup 2018 is coming close. Yesterday Croatia joined the finals (there where huge parties going on by the Croatians living in Austria, it was fun) and now I wish them all the luck to ship it home :) And I wish myself some more points for the [guessing game from blocktrades](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/final-stage-submit-your-entry-and-win-2-000-sbd). https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png Here are my tips: *** Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 0 | France | vs | Croatia | 1 2| Belgium | vs | England | 1 *** What do you think? Will Croatia win their first title ever or will France will win it again after about 20 years? Greets, Martin

author: mickyscofield
title: The Block trades world cup/ My Selections for the Finals
body:
My Predictions for the worldcup seem to be making positive waves
I jokingly told a Friend that Croatia will crush England with a goal margin of 2 goals to 1.
Little did I knew I was a Prophet in disguise Lol!

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
2 | France | vs | Croatia | 3
2 | Belgium | vs | England | 1

Up there is my predictions for the Finals and 3rd place
I am positive about the Croatia team lifting the trophy
They've got a united aggressive team.

![unnamed (4).png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmT2ezcDto3uhdu8k535LgC9QZLgDtf9LKr1cUDDXwdHG9/unnamed%20(4).png)
[Source](https://www.google.com.ng/search?q=2018+world+cup+final&client=tablet-android-transsion&prmd=niv&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjJieOIs5rcAhVLJ1AKHR9ND1UQ_AUIEigC&biw=800&bih=1280#imgrc=x27jDnRB6Rm4OM:)



France too got a formidable force to break through for a win but Nay!...I see Croatia as the better side to make do of opportunities.

Lesson Learnt from the Croatian Squad
>Nobody should be underrated. There is a always a wining strategy as there exists losing strategy too...

Look deep and utilize your potentials.
When your friends lay insults or nay say about you. Hold firm and believe in you

**YOU ARE THE ARCHITECT OF YOUR OWN SUCCESS**

author: xabi
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Finals
body:
So, finally we had our semifinals of Soccer World Cup 2018 with France defeating Belgium (expected) and Croatia defeating England (a slight up set). We are now headed into finals on sunday, as France will take on Croatia for the title. 
![image.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmYkh3tPtHvTqbdBxss1WFW4L1xsrZ2JaXgJXV4qTKWyg8)
[*(Source)*](http://www.fifanews.us/2018-fifa-world-cup-final-france-vs-croatia-lineups-score-predictions/)
But before that we will have another match for the 3rd place: England will face Belgium.
As far as Belgium and England are concerned, their world cup has ended and it doesn't really matters who wins the third place. There is no place of runner ups, let alone be third ones.
And for the finals, no one can predict the outcome with 100% certainty. Croatia will be highly pumped up after securing a place in finals for the first time ever and they have nothing to lose . French, on the other side does have the advantage of speedy attack, solid defence and confidence (their 3rd world cup finals). However, if Croatia can holds France for the first half, their chances will improve significantly. 
## My Selection
This will be my last pick up for entry into @blocktrades world cup. 
Here is the link to the [announcement post](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/final-stage-submit-your-entry-and-win-2-000-sbd).
So here are my bets.
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
3 | France | vs | Croatia | 1
2 | Belgium | vs | England | 1

![spc3.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmXMh2gYjm5g9gLPxgmEJx5V1NESWUfhWsosP5ezfmPXjD)

### In the end, I want to pay my regards to @blocktrades for sponsoring, and @acidyo and @anomadsoul for organizing this amazing community engaging project.
## <center>You all rock!!! </center>

author: rauzaljm
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Finals
body:
**The final match was held at Luzhniki Stadium located in Khamovniki District within the Okrug Administrative Sentral, Moscow.** ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/kkyroorey5.jpg) source **The 2018 World Cup final match between the French and Croatian national team will be held at Luzhniki Stadium on Sunday (15/7/2018) at 22.00 WIB. ** ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/haw3xw5yh1.jpg) source **France advanced to the final after beating Belgium in the semifinals with a thin score 1-0 through goals scored by Samuel Umtiti in the 51st minute at St Petersburg Stadium on Wednesday (11/7/2018) or Thursday morning GMT.** **A day later, England bow their knees before Croatia in the World Cup semi-finals. Final score 2-1 for Croatia's advantage. ** ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/mwlwlvewx3.jpg) source **While Belgium will face England in the third round of scramble, which will be held at the St Petersburg Stadium on Saturday (14/7/2018) at 21.00 pm. **
**My prediction**
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 2 | France | vs | Croatia | 1 1 | Belgium | vs | England | 1 > **If steemian friends want to participate in this contest, please click on the link below :** https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/final-stage-submit-your-entry-and-win-2-000-sbd **Thank to @blocktrades for sponsor this contest, and thank to @acidyo and @anomadsoul for organizing this contest!**

body:
![IMG_45333.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/Qma4ZGdoBoS3tLXqjZDHKyjqHAN8CcoqPxfAVg4A21fTxm) ### Saleum...

World Cup semi-final match in 2018 Russia ends. in French and Croatian semi-final matches that made it to Russia's 2018 World Cup finals. While England and Belgium will compete 3rd champion Russia 2018 World Cup.

The 3rd winner will take place on 14 July 2018 Russia time. Next France and Croatia will compete in the final round of the 2018 Russia world cup on 15 July 2018.

The 2018 World Cup Final will be held on Sunday 15 July 2018. The French side will face Croatia at the Luzhniki Stadium, Moscow, Russia. France are chasing a World Cup title for the second time after 1998. While Croatia are eyeing history won the title for the first time. The 2018 World Cup final will be fun. Because both teams are equally able to lower the best power. No one gets sanctioned or injured.

This is my prediction in the match for the third winner of the Belgian national team Vs England and in the final round of the 2018 World Cup Russia, Croatia will face France.

author: kamchore
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Finals
body:
Dear Steemians, Football World Cup entered into Grand Finale. Only two matches are left. One for the third position  which will be played tomorrow b/w Belgium & England the other one is the big final which will be held on Sunday 15 July b/w France vs Croatia

![final-3532163_960_720.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQkh1Wi7dT8E3e2YowM9Jfw5up4hFrm9mymcyE6KQBPCR)
image credit: [pixabay](https://pixabay.com/en/final-endgame-3532163/)
Earlier in semi-final matches, France outclassed Belgium by 1-0. Thanks to Samuel Umtiti's header which helped france to enter world cup final 3rd Time. Croatia  won the match against England  to book the place in the final of world cup first. This  is the first time that Croatian team is playing the final At one stage Croatia was down by 1 - 0 when Kirean Trippeier scored the first goal in a free kick in the 5th minute. Croatia bounced back well and won the match by the margin of of 2-1 in extra time. 
Just like the world cup competition  it is the last battle of @blocktrades  world cup competition which  is organized by @blocktrades  with collaboration of @anomadsoul @acidyo The price money is big. Total reward of the contest is 2000 SBD:). If you want to participate in this contest. click [here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/final-stage-submit-your-entry-and-win-2-000-sbd)

**Here is the my prediction for Grand Finale**
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
2 | France | vs | Croatia | 1
3 | Belgium | vs | England | 1


It is hard to predict the final result, My heart is saying Croatia will win the cup after a tough match but my mind is saying France is a true champion. Let's see who take out the cup. I wish the supporters of both teams good luck. All the best. Have a nice time

author: themightyvolcano
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Finals
body:
The World Cup finals are almost here!  Get ready for the action on Sunday as Croatia will play in their first ever World Cup finals.  They will be underdogs against the French.  Will they have enough heart to finish this spectacular run with a win over France?  Tune in Sunday to find out!  

![IMG_2870.JPG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmP7AzUFPWLzcUWcPg2WmAry9mL7dygnSU5GGScd67WTLm/IMG_2870.JPG)

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | France | vs | Croatia | 0
2 | Belgium | vs | England | 1

In my heart I'm rooting for Croatia to win.  I only picked France because I feel Croatia will be tired from three straight extra time games.  It will be a great game and I won't miss it.

# Hello teman-teman steemian?
Selamat berbahagia dan selamat bersenang-senang. Karena sebentar lagi final piala dunia yang diadakan di Rusia haampir selesai. Final Piala Dunia hampir tiba! Bersiaplah untuk aksi pada hari Minggu karena Kroasia akan bermain di putaran final Piala Dunia pertama mereka. Mereka akan menjadi underdog melawan Prancis. Akankah mereka memiliki cukup hati untuk menyelesaikan lari spektakuler ini dengan kemenangan atas Prancis? Tonton di hari Minggu untuk mencari tahu!

title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Finals
body:
The Semi Finals stage finished a few minutes ago and we already know the matches for the Final and third place matches

As you already know, @blocktrades loves to sponsor this type of community engaging projects and @anomadsoul & @acidyo know a lot of Steemians love this game, so we decided to organize this enormous Football World Cup event.

With only two games ahead of us, some people are already way too far for others to get close and there¬¥s only a few people who can actually win the cup and get a share of the prize pool.

To keep participating, your name MUST BE ON THIS LIST and you have to make a post picking each winner for the last 2 games, the final and the third place matches. You have to include the score you think will happen on these 2 games in Regular time (only the first 90 minutes):

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 3 | France | vs | Croatia | 0 1 | Belgium | vs | England | 0

YOU HAVE TO USE THE NEXT TEMPLATE TO MAKE YOUR POST. REMEMBER THE TEAM NAMES MUST BE IN ENGLISH. WE RECCOMEND COPYING AND PASTING THE NEXT TABLE TO MAKE YOUR POST, JUST INCLUDE YOUR PREDICTION SCORES. THE SCORE MUST BE CONSIDERED WHEN THE 90 MINUTES END, SO THERE CAN BE TIES.

Scoring

You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn¬¥t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point.

Good luck everyone and let the predictions begin!

You can submit your entry until July 14th 2018 at 16:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone.

This is a @blocktrades sponsored contest, if you like what he is doing, vote for @blocktrades as witness here

title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Finals
body:
Hello to all football supporters! Hello everyone!
These are my predictions for the Finals of the @blocktrades World Cup.

ScoreTeamvsTeamScore
1FrancevsCroatia1
2BelgiumvsEngland1

The beauty of the World Cup is that while thirty-two countries get to cheer for their respective teams, the event also affirms a global pluralism - it is as much a festival of cultural multiplicity as it is a competition featuring some of the best athletes in the world.
‚Äî Clint Smith

FIFA World Cup 2018 third-place playoff: Belgium and England will play at St Petersburg on Saturday July 14.

FIFA World Cup 2018 final: France and Croatia will play at the Luzhniki Stadium in Moscow on Sunday July 15.

The World Cup experience is more than just the game of soccer. It's an event. And it will fly by faster than you think. It will end and you'll be saying, 'Wow, it's over already?' You have to remember to take it all in and enjoy it.
‚Äî Cobi Jones

Who will win World Cup 2018? We'll know soon


More Details >>

body:
Todo tiene un comienzo y tambi√©n un final, y el mundial Rusia 2018 llega a su etapa cumbre, de 32 selecciones que dieron lo mejor por coronarse campe√≥n del mundo solo 2 tienen la posibilidad de alzar la copa y ser campe√≥n por los siguientes 4 a√±os, la selecci√≥n de Francia y Croacia, los franceses desplegaron un buen futbol despu√©s de un flojo debut ante su similar de Australia, y con la figura del muchacho mbappe de tan solo 19 a√±os y todo su equipo llegan a la final como gran favorito, por otra parte la selecci√≥n de Croacia rompi√≥ todos los pron√≥sticos y se col√≥ a la final, desplegando muy buen futbol. As√≠ que esta final estar√° muy re√±ida, y cualquier cosa puede pasar.
Tambi√©n el concurso patrocinado por @blocktrades, @acidyo y @anomadsoul llega a su final, y ya somos pocos los que tenemos chance de quedar entre los primeros, aproximadamente 150 stemians tenemos entrada v√°lida para esta √∫ltima presentaci√≥n de acertar el resultado por el tercer lugar y primer lugar respectivamente, en lo personal me siento ya ganador por los resultados acertados, y es un gran honor estar entre los 150 primeros lugares. De m√°s de 1.800 participantes ya solo 150 (aprox) tienen la oportunidad de conseguir el incentivo de 2.000 sbd, de ante mano suerte para todos y √©xitos a los ganadores.
Link del post. [aqui](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/final-stage-submit-your-entry-and-win-2-000-sbd) En las √∫ltimas fechas no he estado muy acertado, y en esta ocasi√≥n veo desde mi punto de vista superior a Francia, y a Belgica para ganar el tercer lugar. Aunque ganando Croacia dejar√≠a buen sabor para m√≠ al ver nuevo campe√≥n del mundo en la historia, as√≠ que mis pron√≥sticos quiz√°s sean algo exagerados y abultados pero no todos pensamos iguales. Aqu√≠ les dejo mis pron√≥sticos y que gane el mejor.

body:
Hello steemians I hope you are very well, the end of the world cup has arrived and the vast majority of the fans have their team out of the world cup, congratulations to those who were starting for the countries that will face in the great final and they are making their dreams come true, without a doubt the great surprise of the World Cup is Croatia, although many people liked the team starting the World Cup. I do not know anyone who would nominate them for the final, This contest @blocktrades has kept us with very high expectations jejeej, with the games on Saturday and Sunday can add a total of 6 points, which in theory could catapult to the first place all who have 41 points accumulated until the semifinals . I wish you all luck, we are already in the final stretch and we will soon know who will be the winners of this incredible contest. body:
https://img.fifa.com/image/upload/t_l4/sf65ntwegt4pjfry4ahx.jpg
[Source](https://www.fifa.com/worldcup/organisation/ticketing/apply-for-tickets.html)

The long wait is finally here.  In just a few hours the world will know who will rank 3rd and 4th for this year‚Äôs football tournament.  

Since both Belgium and England were defeated during their last games, they will now fight for the 3rd and 4th place respectively.

This will surely be a good duel between two highly tactical teams.  Both teams shows high level of energy and enthusiasm to win in their previous games, unfortunately both failed to hit their goal in favor of France and Croatia.

Speaking of France and Croatia, both of these team were lucky enough to enter the Final round now vying for the highest and second rank of the world‚Äôs famous sports tournament.

This will be the closest match in the world cup, both of the team have high solid defenses and both are composed of highly tactical players.

So while the world are waiting for the two last games of the world cup, here I am casting my personal score prediction as my entry to the contest hosted by @worldcup-russia.  Hoping I could get more scores to add with my current scores which I got from my previous predictions of the last rounds.  If you also want to join the contest you may click HERE for more info.

title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Finals
body:
Hello everyone! [This World Cup](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes) is about to end and we are still competing. It has been an incredible experience to be able to share our predictions along with so many members of the community. Thanks to @blocktrades, @anomadsoul & @acidyo for sponsoring and organizing such an exciting event. I'm still crossing my fingers for the chance to afford him a football training summer camp once we win some of that prize pool. Love you, bro, the best luck of all to you. So, this is it. For [the **final stage**](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/final-stage-submit-your-entry-and-win-2-000-sbd), here are our ultimate thoughts: Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 1 | France | vs | Croatia | 1 2 | Belgium | vs | England | 1 Don't forget to enjoy the last days of the celebration!
[![..jpg](https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png)](https://pixabay.com/photo-3344911)

author: jmetroya
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Finals
body:
The end came, a full month of football with 32 teams competing for the title of world champion ends this weekend. A World Cup that left us many surprises, from its classifieds, without two major world soccer powers such as Italy and Holland, as the development of the tournament itself, where powers such as Germany the reigning champion who did not pass the first phase, while on the other side the South Americans this time could not with the power of European football. Another surprise is doubt was what host Russia did when he eliminated Spain in the second round and went far. https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png

link

Among other things to highlight in this world was the historical use of the VAR, which if used with guts will be a good tool that will make the game more fair, but in my opinion it takes away the essence of what football is. All this is reduced to two games, one for the third place, the party that nobody wants to play and the one in the grand final, here I will leave my predictions and the link for those who want to participate. Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 2 | France | vs | Croatia | 1 2 | Belgium | vs | England | 1

body:
# Russia 2018 FIFA world cup

# *3rd place & final match.*

**For me** this 2018 FIFA World Cup tournament has really bring some exciting games, and it full of controversial and interesting decisions. 
This tournament has actually produces stars, more goals than the previous world cup finals.

  Have undergone with the predictions of the group stages, to the round of 16, quarter final, semi final.
